website_summaries.verdict: This vacuum has good pickup power. Stands out for extended hose reach and many attachments.
pros: Powerful motor can handle most debris, including pet hair
Filter is simple to access for cleaning
Various attachments allow cleaning of areas that other vacuums can't reach, including a 6-foot hose, dusting brush, turbo brush tool, crevice tool, and extension wand
cons: Vacuum weighs over 15 pounds, which some users might find difficult to maneuver

customer_reviews.title: Good price for what u get
customer_reviews.text: It's a good purchase. Good price and it's pretty light weight. Cons, hard to clear dust from canister during dump, no automatic cord roll up, hose is short and not user friendly, vacuum rotating brush continually spins even if you're just using the hose sucker which can lead to burning the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Maile Hemm

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is the best vacuum I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is amazing! I hate having to vacuum the house and usually try to get my girlfriend to do it but this vacuum actually made this mundane chore a breeze! Setup was so easy I didn't need to read the instructions and I vacuumed the carpet and hardwood floor with no issues. It's lightweight, less noisy than previous vacuum cleaners we've owned, moves around easily, and actually picks up all the dog hair in legit one pass! I'll never be in the dog house again for not vacuuming! Thank you Bissell! Oh and emptying the container is a simple button click!
customer_reviews.author: SonicD007

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disapointed in Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I received this vacuum cleaning in a beat up box tapped horribly with clear tape and holes. The brush attachment was broken with half of the piece missing. This is the first large scale item bought from Amazon and I will be hesitant on purchasing large items. I'd be better off paying more for the item at a store, insuring I'd received all parts without the busted up box. Shame on you AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: E. McCalla

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars!! Broke and almost caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: Seriously awful product. It broke after the 3rd time using it for no reason, the motor just blew out of no where and started smoking. Good thing I noticed the smell of smoke before the whole think blew up. Don’t waste your money on this garbage! And they’re customer support is absolute crap! Tried calling to get a replacement and got no where. If I could give it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 2 months, and now it won’t turn on. Even when it did work I found it quickly lost suction with our German Shepherd hair clogging filters. It was annoying to dump the canister and clean filters on every use to maintain suction. I will not be seeking a warranty repair as I’ve decided to go back to a bag vacuum, and I’m outside of the return period from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped picking up after a few months. Hopefully, I will get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B

customer_reviews.title: Clogs Uncontrollably
customer_reviews.text: Their "one pass technology" doesn't work. The suction is good, but the hose clogs literally every minute. Not good for pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: it seemed to have good suction and clean well
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum quit working within the first 5 minutes of using it. Front roller floor brush siezed up and started burning the belt. I immediately shut it off but I couldn't even spin the brush by hand and there was melted plastic fragments around the belt... The few minutes it did work, it seemed to have good suction and clean well. But overall it seems to be made of cheap plastic and low quality compared to previous vacuums I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A whole lotta value for the dollar
customer_reviews.text: OK, maybe I should wait till we've owned it longer but so far this thing is great. We wanted an inexpensive upright for our finished downstairs that could double as an emergency unit on the main floor. This is all we hoped for an more, and cost less than what we budgeted. Easy to use, does a great job, has the tools to do many tasks that can stow right on-board. Made the place look great and made it an easy task to do as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this, seriously. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the best vacuum from the start, but now the lower hose blows out dust when we try to use it. How convenient. I recommend spending your money elsewhere. I looked through reviews and decided to get it anyways (against better judgement) Now I have to purchase another vacuum. Thanks Bissel, this product is exactly what I needed to go along with the first Bissel I had replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as good as before
customer_reviews.text: My parents have the same model but ordered it about a year or 2 ago. The quality is great on the old model. I decided to order my own and it's a big difference . The plastic handle feels extremely cheap where you can feel the border of the vacuum and it's scratchy. Anyway the sucking power is great which is why I'll give it a 4/5 . I recommend this product . Will update if anything changes .
customer_reviews.author: Victor H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on pet hair and stickers !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, picked up the pet hair from the shedding of our Sable Shepherd really well and the irritating stickers that the dogs bring in from outside. I love that it's something I can take the canister and wash it after each use if I want and the sponge filter can be washed and left to dry. I had a Shark for years and then it broke, and saw that this one had great ratings. The only thing I didn't like was that it was delivered without any packaging.. So people could see what was sitting on the front porch because it just came with my address written on the outside of the box itself.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Good on carpet terrible on hard floors
customer_reviews.text: Like any other vacuum cleaner. Its pulls stuff out of the carpet well! However it really sucks on hard floor cant clean for anything the brush always spins super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best vacuum cleaner I've owned. It's almost unbelievable that it costs under $100. It covers a wide space and hits the edges very well. The height adjustments are right one. It is easy to empty and clean. I waited almost a year to post this review to verify it's durability. It's still working like the day I unboxed it and used it for the first time. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: This Vacuum Cleaner Handle is Poorly Designed!
customer_reviews.text: I just wasted 15 minutes unpacking, assembling, vacuuming and regretting this vacuum cleaner purchase. My hand hurts from the POORLY designed vacuum cleaner handle. I then decided there was no way I was going to settle maneuvering an uncomfortable vacuum cleaner for the next few years. I repacked, and that was not easy, but I did it. Requested a refund on a defective product. Any vacuum cleaner that is poorly designed in the handle, in my opinion is defective.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bissell has made a believer out of me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vacuum. I have had a pet rewind for several years that I felt just needed replacing. I have changed the filters and belt, etc. many times. It was a good machine. I got this one and immediately put it to work. It sucked way more dirt. I am now sold on one-pass. Very good! I also realize, upon receiving the new machine, that the hose was heat kinked like it had been too close to something very hot. Bissell's customer care team was excellent! They shipped me a new hose under warranty and I had it within a few business days. I also have one of their shampooers. Works very well too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: The useless thing ever
customer_reviews.text: it doesn’t have any cleaning power although it is very heavy. It is impossible to be satisfied after cleaning with that machine . You have to clean with your hand after using Bissell. While I am using that machine , its equipments are falling down orderly .Furthermore, It is making so much noise. when it is working , the smell is like burning plastic . I am really regretful buying Bissell,and I don’t recommend it anyone
customer_reviews.author: Manny&Nafiye

customer_reviews.title: Belt keeps breaking
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum did pretty good until the belt broke. I bought a new Bissell belt, put it on and within a minute, it broke. Bought a new two pack of Bissell belts and both broke within minutes. I checked the numbers to make sure they were the correct belts. Now I am stuck buying a new vacuum already because this one keeps breaking belts. Pretty much a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction that will pick up on a One Sweep vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: It picks up okay but it does not pick up as well as was in other reviews. It is not a One Sweep vacuum cleaner. I bought it because of the good reviews so I was disappointed. I would not recommend this vacuum as an exceptional vacuum cleaner. It is an okay vacuum cleaner. Really wish I had returned this
customer_reviews.author: Joe Burns

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase I have ever made. This thing has given us complications since the first day we got it. It whistles very loudly when vacuuming on bare floor. It ricochets dirt, and the handheld piece has completely broken into pieces. Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Little to no suction
customer_reviews.text: We've had this vacuum now for seven months and it has little to no suction. We vacuum the same spot over and over only to see the visible crumbs and pieces of paper, etc. still sitting on the carpet. And when we are lying on the floor, you can see dust clouds fly even after having just vacuumed. Would love a refund since this was all we could afford on our small income...
customer_reviews.author: Christa Sena

customer_reviews.title: You have to stick your hand up in the filth and dust you just sucked up to get it all out
customer_reviews.text: Edit - after 6 months of light use this vacuum cleaner is a piece of junk. The hose is too tight and you can’t use the accessories without the whole unit snapping forward with the hose or tipping over. The canister is impractical to clean. You have to stick your hand up in the filth and dust you just sucked up to get it all out. It is ridiculously loud. And - don’t bother calling Bissell for support. I spent 20 min off and on hold only to be told that I would have to contact a local service center. Ugh. Normally I’m not so negative - I’m a little peeved at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Tina00C2002

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a bundle with the cordless pet vac have had nothing but issues the pet vac stopped working after 7 uses. I have gotten in touch with the seller and they are sending a new one which is nice. But having used this vacuum a hand full of times the belt seized up and started smoking horribly not sure if its a defect problem or what but its pretty sad. Guess you get what you pay for. This is my first time getting a bissell product and sadly so far I am not impressed with them
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vacuum, but really, really loud
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so first off, I love this vacuum in general. I have a long haired cat and this is the only thing keeping me from having cat fur permanently embedded in my carpet. It works fantastic, and the attachments are great at getting cat fur off pillows, ottomans, couches, blankets, me, etc. However, it is so, so loud. Fortunately it works so well you don't need to run it for long, but oh my god. The first time I turned it on I thought I'd opened the gates into hell.
customer_reviews.author: 'Kita

customer_reviews.title: Best mistake ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was not going to ever order another Bissell again! Years ago I was unhappy with Bissell and decided I would not buy anything Bissell. My favorite (Name Brand) vacuum was lost or misplaced when we moved and the stick vac wasn't working well. I needed a vacuum ASAP! I went to a discount site found a vacuum was transferred to Amazon and ordered it without realizing that it wasn't my favorite brand. Desperate for a clean carpet I tried it out. Amazing! The vacuum stays.
customer_reviews.author: DotingAunt

customer_reviews.title: Belt broke on 2nd use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the vacuum and received on Monday used it to vacuum one room on that same day and vacuum was perfect! Saturday arrived and I vacuumed another room and vacuum started smoking and brush stopped moving. Removed bottom and saw that belt was burned/broken. For $100 I expected to get more than 2 vacuums. Of belt hadn’t broken this vacuum would be rated better 5 stars because it picked up tons of dog hair. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: this can't be right
customer_reviews.text: this thing makes super weird noises, like so weird that we have questioned if we got one that has a problem. works ok - not great, but ok. I'd say "adequate" is a good descriptor. very difficult and messy to clean. In fact, this is the biggest knock against it, and that was the dealbreaker for us. we intended to send it back but our kids destroyed the box so now we are the not-so-proud forever-owners of this strange-sounding adequate vacuum that leaves my floors messier when I empty the bin than whatever was gained from vacuuming. oh well :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woah! So impressed with this!
customer_reviews.text: Woah! Let me just tell you how incredibly impressed I am with this vacuum cleaner! I’ve been trying to find a decent one on a budget and I think I just found the gem!! I live in an apartment complex that has super cheap, yucky carpet. I went over my carpet with my old vacuum and then went over it the very next day with this one when it came in, and holy sh*t I could NOT believe how much crapped it STILL sucked out of my carpet!!!! Guys, seriously, this thing is amazing and perfect for those on super tight budgets like me, who can’t afford dyson or shark. You won’t be disappointed with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Mayton

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a tank!
customer_reviews.text: Way more powerful than I expected! I had a Dyson before this and worried about getting one that was so cheap in comparison. While I miss the maneuverability of my Dyson, this thing is just as powerful! It’s also very lightweight which is great for going up and down stairs. One of the best features is that all of the extra tools, which I use constantly, are all attached to the vacuum itself. No need to go digging around for the crevice tool in the back of a closet. So easy to switch the tools on and off too. Love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Pets? High traffic? This is a must!
customer_reviews.text: I just vacuumed our carpets twice yesterday with a $250 dyson vacuum (animal). This thing arrived today and in one pass picked up a ton of pet hair and dirt missed by the vacuum that is 3 times the cost. Easy to assemble—way more capacity between entire; way easier to empty (always have to disassemble the dyson canister to get all the debris out—this all falls out at the press of the release button. Only con I can see is it feels easy to break (but so does the dyson and I’d by three of these before I bought another dyson) Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases. It is lightweight and easy to assemble. The one that I had prior to this had a button I could press and It would suck the cord up for me. I wish this one had that feature. This is the only thing that I feel like could be added with this vacuum cleaner. I’ve had mine over a year now and the suction is still great.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Great machine compared to...
customer_reviews.text: For clarity I am comparing this machine to a Bissel Turbo Powerforce 6585. I didn't know about all the dirt and fluff my old machine left behind until I used this machine. It is lightweight which is great for older folks. The extention wand falls out of its clip once in a while. Other accessories are very easy to store, and use. It goes under sofas and beds much farther and easier than my old machine. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TimeFlying

customer_reviews.title: You have to try this vacuum, its AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: THIS VACUMM IS AMAZING! this gives my Dyson a run for their money. I was such a Dyson snob for most of my lifetime, but tried this one because every Dyson I bought died or something malfunctioned, and I hated spending all that money and then to have to purchase a new one because my Dyson would be past its 1 year warrantee. This vacuum is very light, able to carry easily, maneuvers around easily, suction is GREAT, and it does suck up all the dirt and debris easily. Hands down, I would recommend this product to all my friends and family. Its such a shock how great this vacuum works. I LOVE IT, Glad I purchased it now!
customer_reviews.author: Hapa

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with pet allergies
customer_reviews.text: After using a cheap vacuum for years, this model is a serious upgrade. Dirt and dander that had been stuck in my carpets for years quickly filled the chamber of this vacuum. The suction power is no joke. Be careful near the edges of area carpets and power cords. The bare floor setting is very aggressive and is capable of even pulling dirt from between floor boards. This vacuum earns it's selling point as great budget option for pet owners for its ability to clear up dander from upholstery and carpets as well as fleas from bare floors.
customer_reviews.author: david nespoli

customer_reviews.title: It's a workout.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very hard to push and pull on all height settings except bare floors. It is very clumsy to operate. I bought this to make vacuuming easier. Not the case. Suction was good. Cheaply made. You get what you pay for. I will be spending a little more money to get something that takes the work out of housework.
customer_reviews.author: downdogoz

customer_reviews.title: The worst vacuum I have ever used and I am almost 60!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a toy. The electrical cord is very short. The brush never stops turning! There is not an off position! When set to bare floors the brush beats up your hardwood or linoleum floors! The video showed her moving from carpet to bare floor without adjusting! Very poor suction. I tried various levels to try to pickup lint on the carpet. None of them worked! To pickup anything I had to beat up my rugs with the brush. Too bad I tore up the box. I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: ESushi

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the start
customer_reviews.text: We just got this vacuum today and it was broken from the start. The bristles won’t move an inch. I tried to sweep a rug and it picked up dust and dirt but only because it was filthy... My husband called bissell and they said that part of the vacuum was not covered under the warranty but they would send out a new brush. 5-7 business days of living in the dirt still...:(
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: There are pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum because it has a height adjustment for shag carpet. It does well on the carpet however it still has a little trouble because my carpet is plush so it sucks down a little too much. A pro is that it is lightweight but a con is that it tips over easily when using the wand which is short. Con is that it has a 20 foot cord so you have to move the plug several times to go from room to room. Pro is that the filter sponge is easy to rinse out and put back in. Pro The canister bin is easy to empty and take apart to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belt keeps falling off! Only those who live in the City!!
customer_reviews.text: The belt keeps falling off! We have had this vacuum for over a year and it is a pain. I understand the filters make sure more dust and dander are picked up, but when you live in the country it just means you are constantly cleaning the filter. As in the filter has to be cleaned Every Single Use! This vacuum is more maintenance than use with having to put the belt back on and filter cleaning. We live in the desert, with 3 dogs, 3 cats and horses. Our home will never be spotless, it cleaning needs to be an efficient process. This vacuum is Only be good for those who live in the City!
customer_reviews.author: ZDnm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multiple pet households
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to write a review as most vacuums we've had don't make it past a month. I have 7 cats, a toddler, and myself, I have long hair. In the past few years every vacuum we have bought could not stand up to the hair and dust our house accumulates. This is the ultimate pet and dust vacuum! Brings new life to my carpet! I even feel as though my air in my house is cleaner after vacuuming! If you have had a nearly impossible time finding a vacuum to handle multiple pets and lots of fur? This is the go to!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, reliable, easy to empty & clean dirt compartment
customer_reviews.text: It's important to me that a vacuum cleaner be easy to assemble, and, for the sake of my cleaning lady (who will be using it), that it be easy to empty the dirt compartment, remove and clean the mechanism inside the dirt compartment, and easy (if someday neccessary) to install a new filter. The unit does what it is supposed to do. This is a relief after working with another brand where my cleaning lady & I had frustrating,ultimately impossible experiences reassembling the dirt compartment. That other vacuum cleaner is now stored in the garage; not broken down, yet no longer possible to use. Thanks for keeping it simple Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A.Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you....
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit leery of buying such an inexpensive vacuum cleaner, but after reading such positive reviews I decided to give it a try. I am not disappointed. It claims to be a "one-pass" vacuum and sure enough, it is. It does a great job picking up dog fur (I have two) and everything else it comes across. I've only had it a very short time but I'm hopeful it will have a lot of "life" in it for a good, long time. I purchased a fairly expensive Shark several years ago and it broke very shortly after purchase. Wish I had tried a Bissell before wasting that money.
customer_reviews.author: TheTruthOnly

customer_reviews.title: Suits all of our needs
customer_reviews.text: We just laid down some new laminate flooring which made the majority of our home (minus 3 rooms) bare floors. We definitely needed something that would work well on both laminate and carpet. After doing lots of research, I came across this vacuum. It's perfect! The floors are very well vacuummed and WOW, the pet hair!!! That was our second issue with 2 dogs. We may not see a lot of pet hair but when we vacuum, we could create a new dog!
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, Average overall.
customer_reviews.text: Pros -Tremendous suction power. Pulls out dust that you never knew existed -The carpet mode and hard wood floor mode is helpful -Good set of attachments. However, the upholstery attachment does not work as well as you would expect. Only works at a particular angle. Cons -Hair gets stuck in it a lot. -It is very difficult to use when it comes to cleaning stairs. Overall, a good vacuum cleaner if you want to do basic cleaning of your home.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Panda

customer_reviews.title: Bissell POWERhouse
customer_reviews.text: incredibly powerful. got ALL the dirt down in the carpet DDvl hadnt even touched. carpet looks like new. turbo brush is amazing, sounds like a turbo too, spins so fast. very powerful suction. attachments are are struggle to stretch out the hose its so powerful!. did the couch in twos seconds. even looks cleaner!. super-happy. even the old craft/computer room thats carpeted and stained, and dirty, looks great. if you dont know Bissell, this will win you over in one pass of your most trafficked room. dont Vacuum till it gets there, anything else is a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum SUCKS! (A good thing, too!)
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several dozen of these for my cleaners over the years, I decided to buy one for home since I have had such good luck with them. One handed emptying and plastic bagless can makes this easy to like. I do tear it down to the bones every month to clean out all the dust, run the trap in the deep sink and was the prefilter out regularly. Of course, I would love a Dyson but I can buy 6 of these over the years and equal the price of the Dyson. I am satisfied, the carpet is clean, SWMBO is happy... :-)
customer_reviews.author: The Building Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a game changer. 10 stars. Will it last? Time will tell but I just got this thing delivered, put it together and off I went. I sucked more dirt out of my carpet than you could have ever imagine. And I thought my house was clean!! My dyson is, as of now, a distant memory. UPDATE 5/21/19 - I still love this vacuum but after using several times I have to say the only issue is the cord. It’s way too short and it’s a very stiff low quality cord. I own a custom lighting company so trust me....I know my cords. Other than that it’s still a solid 5 stars for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mcdee

customer_reviews.title: Decent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Edit 4/2020: Brush bristles are disintegrating from the the plastic holder. So between this and the constantly-disconnecting hose (when used as a hand tool), this vacuum is annoying. Lastly, and this is on us for not realizing, it doesn't have auto cord-rewind. ------------ The vacuum works decently and it's not too loud. It doesn't have auto-rewind which I didn't think to check as I thought it was a standard feature on these types of vacuums. One annoyance is the hose where it connects to the chassis, if you're using the crevice tool and moving the hose around, it almost always unscrews itself from the main chassis. There is no lock or tab screw or anything to keep it connected.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum. This is my first canister vacuum and it's so cool to see what gets captured in there. The section is VERY strong, but it is surprisingly not as loud as I thought it would be. I would like the hose to be a little looser for ease of vacuuming things like the couch or hard-to-reach corners, but it still works well. I also was afraid that my long hair would get caught in the bristles, but the section is strong enough to suck it right into the canister! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Etch-a-sketch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is a piece of crap. After one month the wheel fell off. Now we just hit a year and the handle that holds the filter popped off and is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Eustice

customer_reviews.title: Hard working, great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 German Shepherds and 2 cats and 3 kids, so we do a lot of vacuuming. This thing is tough, light weight and does a great job. It does get some dirt build up at the top of the dust bin that can be hard to get out but it hasn't caused a significant problem. It's a good idea to have an extra filter so you can have one while the other is drying (once you wash it). I did end up adding in a Rooma (980 series) to adjunct this but I still do lots of vacuuming with this workhorse every week. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JulJ

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again..
customer_reviews.text: You can tell it’s cheap plastic probably from China, and the hose (which all suction must go though) doesn’t stay connected causing me to sto vacuuming and put it back before I continue. Cheap thin plastic. Not even smooth, I actually slit my finger wide open on the piece of pastiche that holds the hose. I wouldn’t buy one again. But if you cannot afford a nice vacuum and can put up with something cheap that will last maybe a half of a year. Than go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Bellis423

customer_reviews.title: ok Vacuum for the money
customer_reviews.text: I only used this vacuum twice so far. Mostly at this time I can only say that it feels "cheap". Very plastic. I am a little disappointed because I have bought vacuums in the past for the same price and they didn't feel cheap. I also don't feel that the lowest setting for hard wood floors is appropriate for hard floors. It doesn't change much like my last vacuum even sounded different when it was changed to the hardwood floor setting. I am considering returning this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: KM-PA

customer_reviews.title: Dumb Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for a while now. My biggest annoyance is the tools hose so easily disconnects from the machine. I find myself 3 or 4 times having to reconnect. Maddening. The suction is decent if it doesn't get clogged at the entrance to the canister. The intake that leads into the canister gets clogged so often. It's not full but nothing else can get in because dirt, lint, etc gets caught right there. Annoying machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine McClenahan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and hair is EVERYWHERE. It picks up all the hair and I’m amazed at how much it picks up! I was a bit concerned when I opened the box, the tools appeared be used before hand - full of dust and who knows what else. The vacuum itself was clean and did not have the same appearance. Super easy to put together, took less than 5 minutes. The brush that is supposed to work on stairs and furniture doesn’t seem to have the same suction/quality as the rest of the unit, but that is not a huge concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cotie

customer_reviews.title: Returned because it was bad
customer_reviews.text: I used a scented powder made for carpet use. It was too much for this machine. It stopped sucking, the belt broke...it smoked and smelled to high heaven. I returned this machine and for $40 more got a shark. It has worked so great. The belt vacuum is a thing of the past. I do not recommend. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and it is very confusing to choose a good vacuum. I wanted a lightweight powerful suction that came with accessories. I narrowed my search and finally chose this one. I really like it being bagless, it is easy to remove the container and easy to dump the dirt. No mess. The vacuum is light and easy to carry up stairs. There is very little assembly and anyone can do it. It has good suction- almost too good- when I first start pushing it resists but then is easy to move. It picked up a lot of dirt left behind by my ten year old vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelRTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaned everything in our house! Got all of the dog hair off of the couch as well. The only issue I have with it is the length of the hose. I stretches, and maybe it will loosen up a bit, but I had to have the vacuum in one hand and the hose in the other to get the couch done. Like it said, that hose may loosen a bit as it feels firm, but as a vacuum for the floors and carpets, this was perfect. A great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: Beware. The suction on this vacuum is so powerful, it sucked up a piece of old carpet. No complaints. I was planning on replacing the carpet anyway. It also sucked up a cat toy I failed to pick up before vacuuming. No problem there, either. I just took off the dirt container and removed the toy. This vacuum picked up two years worth of dirt my previous vacuum missed. I can't describe the glee I felt when I saw all the dirt and hair in the container. Right now, I LOVE this vacuum. Should it crumble to pieces any time soon, I'll come back to let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hesson

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this. 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months now. I’m so so so happy with this purchase. Fantastic suction, quieter than my old vacuum, nice loooong cord so I don’t have to keep switching outlets in my big living areas, and so so easy to empty without making a mess. The air actually feels cleaner after vacuuming. But that could be just in my head. This vacuum cleans so much better than my old one. Also, I should mention I’m using this in a household with two toddlers and a shorthair cat. Zero issues, zero complaints. I’m completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum roughly 4 months ago. After getting light use in a small house with only 4 carpeted rooms, the vacuum started smoking today. The plastic on the brush wheel had melted and then locked up completely so it can no longer spin. Even when it was working it was extremely loud, and the brush wheel can't be turned off, so even when using the hand tool attachment the carpet brush keeps spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: It's a vacuum. It does its job alright. My complaints are just that it's very clunky, the plastic pieces that hold it upright sound like they are going to break every time I switch to actually using it. I also cant tell much of a difference between the high carpet and bare floor. Overall it's not a terrible vacuuming and it does work, but you're definitely getting what you paid for. I like it enough that I'm going to keep it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it today for the first time. Great suction. Couldn’t believe how much was in my throw rug (that I’ve only had for about 2 weeks or so). That’s a cat for you. However, I have mostly hardwoods in my house. When I started vacuuming them, I thought I had a defective product. The noise was unbelievable. It doesn’t happen on the throw rug, just the hardwood. Extremely loud buzzing noise. Anyone else? I hadn’t seen this in the reviews, otherwise I would have passed. I live in a high rise so I’m sure my neighbors don’t appreciate the noise either.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great when doesn't break mysteriously
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum two months ago.. I barely used it since I'm not home very often. All of a sudden with nothing stuck, I smelled a burning smell. I powered it off right away and took apart the bottom. Well for some reason the spin brush corner got melted and won't spin, but my belt isn't burned or broken. Works great when isn't broken lol.. Totally disappointing. I normally buy bissel for cheap and sharp for expensive.. I got the better Bissell to meet in the middle .. I guess shark is where I need to go.
customer_reviews.author: What Matthew Thinks

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap, this thing sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for the dad vaccuum joke. Bought this for my wife, for her birthday, as a gag gift (we needed a new vaccuum anyways). I did the first pass on our area rug in our living room. It was like I had just mowed the grass. It was such a difference, even compared to what our old vaccuum. I was actually surprised / disgusted, by the amount of things that it pulled up, that our old vaccuum had been leaving behind. Sure there are a couple things I would change, but for this price, you will find no better.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for a small price
customer_reviews.text: I had my carpets professionally cleaned and closed up the house during a 2 week vacation the next day. When i returned, i ran the vacuum over the floor and was shocked at the embedded dust and dirt the vacuum sucked up. There was enough left behind by the pro's to fill about 1/6 of the see through container. At about $75 delivered, this unit is well-worth the price and appears to work better than vacuums costing 3x as much!
customer_reviews.author: jerry spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but using the attachments annoy me
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum and I think it works great for getting dust and dirt. It’s easy to clean and when I clean the filter it dries faster than other filters I have used in the past. However the extension is way way way too short. I need a chair to get hard to reach places (everything is hard to reach when you’re 5’2) And whenever I use the attachments the whole thing falls over if I’m not holding onto the machine and the attachment at the same time. I also struggle to keep the attachments attached while I’m not using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Treat it well and its a good light vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Would love to review this vacuum but it arrived broken. Bought same one at big box store for $10 less. Easy assembly w only 2 screws. Light easy maneuver. Picks up w no issues. If you're hard on vacuums this is not the one for you. Its has filters YOU MUST CLEAN BEFORE/After use to avoid loss of suction. Not good for wood/tile as most are not designed for that. For the $ it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and is lightweight. The canister empties easily, the accessories all fit snugly in place. I wish the cord was slightly longer but unplugging 3-4 times to cover the area or plugging in to a longer extension cord on each level is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these vacuum cleaners on each level of our home. We have three dogs and one cat so we need to vacuum multiple times per week. I've found having a lightweight unit makes the task easier and therefore more enjoyable. Good value, no frills and bagless with enough suction to pull up dirt and animal hair from floors, carpets, rugs and stairs. Simple installation too. The cord length seems normal, but we always wish the cords were longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: this vacuum is such an awesome vacuum. it's very light for its size. it's easy to use and works really well on long brush carpet and even short brush. when i first got it my carpet was a long brush type of carpet and it worked really well. 2 weeks later i changed out my carpet due to a leak to a short brush type of carpet and my vacuum still works awesome. i love that it is bagless and it is so easy to dump and also easy to clean out the filters. thank you bissell!
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Won't last you long, don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about a year ago and have used it rarely. However, it stopped working on me out of nowhere. Please read your reviews before purchasing, not a lasting product. Additionally, the insurance that comes with this product does not help. Finally, the website to contact this company is temporary out of service.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Loved 4 months, tolerated 4 months, hated 4 months, finding a new vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum at first. Light, quiet, powerful. After a few months, the suction wasn't as good and the hose would fall off often when I was using a hand tool. The last four months, the vacuum has been shooting out more particles and dust than it picks up and the carpet height adjustment is useless. My last vacuuming experience, the vacuum was shooting all sorts of hard debris from the bottom/back and left a pile of droppings after I turned it off. I repeated several times and ended up picking it up with a dustpan. I ordered it almost exactly a year ago. Time for a new vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: J. Urbanic

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for with this vacuum 😖
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum picks up from my rugs, but it spits Everton my hardwood floors out the back end. It no longer has its”cyclone” action and I have to stop and fix one thing or other every couple of minutes. It is beyond loud and it makes an additional hissing noise... like the hose is loose, though I can’t seem to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for a few days now and am super pleased with the way it handled and how powerful the suction it. Love that it dumps out of the bottom of the canister! It was easy to put together. Love the tubro brush. It got all the pet hair off the couch with ease. It was fast too. I used it on the rugs, the bare floor, and carpet. I used it in every room. It was fast and fun...LOL I can't believe I just said that! But it was awesome to see what only 1 pass picked up.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for 19 months then not
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum worked well for the 19 months of standard use, and was well maintained only to have it emit a burning smell and suddenly stop. Unfortunately the manufacture after a long series of questions, requested we disassemble the unit to perform a diagnostic that I did not feel equipped to perform and was advised that the nearest service center 45 minutes away. While i understand this is a limited warranty the chances of us purchasing another Bissel will be very unlikely as we have had far better luck with Hoover machines.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA A. SHAW-GIFFIN

customer_reviews.title: Great vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize how dirty our carpers were until we switched to this vacuum. Great suction and gets everything from on top of the carpet and within the carpet. Works on both carpet and tile. No complaints so farwish we eould have bought soonee
customer_reviews.author: Glenn S

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: We're coming from a much more expensive vacuum, and this was (initially) intended to be a transitional vacuum until we could get something better...We'll, long story short, we'll be keeping this one; it's easy to use, light weight, pretty quiet, and very good cleaning. In fact, that it cleans better than the previous vacuum which cost easily twice as much. I can't come-up with enough superlatives for this vacuum! It seems that cost and advertised features, aren't as important as the ease of use and effectiveness, and this vacuum has plenty of both.
customer_reviews.author: Karlz

customer_reviews.title: Best vaccum for mom of immune compromised child!
customer_reviews.text: This vaccum is more than I could of asked for in a vaccum! It was amazing, easy and really gets the job done! First off I would like to say my youngest has no immune system so I need to best cleaning products and I vaccum everyday. We have not had pets inside in 4 months and no shoes for also 4 months. Second I would like to say it was so easy to put together my 4 year old independently did it! And he helped vaccum the couch easily! It's lightweight easy to use and I will be recommending it to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum last April for my 2nd home in FL. I used it for one week. We returned to FL a week ago and when I went to use it, the hose keeps popping out. I called bissell, they want me to take it to a repair shop. Considering since last April we we've only been in FL for a total of 3 wks. Their customer service hung up on me twice!!They will not stand behind this. I will never purchase a bissell product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy DeRider

customer_reviews.title: Good sucking power and good attachments for all the nooks and crannies of the house.
customer_reviews.text: Great sucking power and cleans the carpet. Not as loud as my previous vacuum. Only problem I have with this vacuum is the tube to clean the steps isn't quite long enough to reach most of my steps. If I have to move to another location from the top of the steps and use the tube from there, the vacuum tips. Otherwise, this is a decent vacuum and plenty of attachments to take care of the corners of the house and the steps. It nice to be able to take off most of the parts/filters and clean them with ease as well.
customer_reviews.author: t winters

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could love a vacuum cleaner, but I was wrong. We got this during Christmas time when our artificial tree was shedding like crazy. That’s of course after our older one (which I believed was a good one) went caput and we had no choice but to get another. I cannot believe how much dirt, dust, tree “needles”, and hair it picked up. I thought our carpet was already pretty clean till I purchased this bad boy. This vacuum was proof of how dirty our floors really were, which was slightly disturbing. I don’t regret buying this vacuum for a moment. It’s incredible!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Goodies

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for pet households! Good value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price range this vacuum is great! We have a long hair cat and this effortlessly picks up hair wo clogging or loss of suction. All variety of floor surfaces can be easily cleaned. Weight is manageable and emptying the bin I do outdoors, hair wads up and I have to reach in at times. The hand rotating brush attachment is effective but I do have to pull hair that gets stuck on handpiece, after use. So it’s not perfect but it’s pretty good. Overall for this price range its better than my former dirt devil. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair, some little annoyances
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I’ve ever owned. We have 2 dogs that shed miserably and this is the first vacuum that pulls ALL the hair out of the carpet. That said, there are some annoying things about it: 1. The cord isn’t retractable. This is a minor inconvenience but still annoying when even the cheap vacuums come with retractable cords. 2. The hose attachments sit pretty precariously on the backside of the vacuum and fall off continually. Super annoying when your infant is napping and you have exactly 30 minutes to vacuum. Fix it, Bissell! Still gave it 5 stars because it works *so* well. Just make life a little easier and fix the little things!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie E Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for sucking up DOG HAIR
customer_reviews.text: This Vacuum works really well , we have a German Shepherd. He sheds a lot , brings in dirt from outside and I was looking for a vacuum that sucks up every hair , dirt on the couch and carpet. I wasn’t disappointed! It’s worth the price and it’s really easy to vacuum with and simple. It was build really well and has great suction power ! I was sceptical about purchasing the vacuum because of the bad reviews and the carpet catching on fire haha but I haven’t had any problems ! I love absolutely love this vacuum. I would recommend it for anyone who wants a long lasting , powerful vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Latinarose

customer_reviews.title: Great standard vaccum
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star quality, regular vaccum. It is not cordless but it really does its job. It looks bulky but it is actually light weight, even for a petite 115 pound Asian like me, I was dragging it around no problem. The suction is quite powerful and I can tell it lifted all the dirt and hair off the carpet, like deep inside from the floor. The container actually was filled with dirt within a minute or two when I first tried it. I have 3 cats and I felt my carpet was completely different afterwards. Emptying it is easy. The design is simply made. Easy to turn on and off. Overall, it performs well for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, kind of delicate however
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second time purchasing this vacuum the exact same model. This model will do a great job. I definitely admit it is a bit flemsy. But, so long as your careful in the initial assembly it will do you wonders for a great price! I would recommend it to anyone or even buy this vacuum again if I didn't already have it. P.s. FYI: One of the clips broke on the first one I bought. But, regardless I taped it and it has still sucked up more dirt than almost any other vacuum i've had. I do not have any pets BTW
customer_reviews.author: BeEasy114

customer_reviews.title: Suction like no other
customer_reviews.text: I was leary of buying a vacuum online. This thing is awesome. The handle may feel a little cheap, but don't let that fool you, this thing will suck the dirt out of your carpet just as well as a vacuum triple the price. It tends to bind a little when you're using the hose. The whole hose set-up is a little poorly thought out, but it still works great! It has a neat little mini vacuum attachment for the hose that just does magic on my couches. Best vacuum I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!!! In a good way
customer_reviews.text: Awesome suction power. Taking off one star as trying to lift it With the lower front handle (to say move it over something) and the dust container comes out half the time. So the latch there could be better. Also it is a little bulky and hard to get in some spots or under low tables. The hose attachment is easy to use. Easy to dump dust from container. The cord is sufficiently long.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ian Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Made vacuuming easier
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs so we have to vacuum daily. The vacuum we had was about to die and we were looking for a good vacuum, with good suction, affordable. I had heard about this Bissell from a friend who also has dogs and I decided to give it a try. I had a different model before but it wasn’t my fav. so I was a little hesitant. I’m glad I decided to get this one because it’s great! It’s easier to clean the canister too. The weight is not super light but it’s not heavy, it’s a decent weight. I don’t like heavy vacuums. It’s the right weight for me. I’m not disappointed and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectttt
customer_reviews.text: Ok listen, we are two broke, messy college girls with two cats. My hair is down to my butt and I cut it myself. I'm *allergic* to our cats. Vacuuming is helllll. But this vacuum is PERFECT. It gets the cat hair, it gets my hair, it gets popcorn kernels after movie night, it gets my fabric scraps when I'm working. The brush attachment even gets my dumb eyeshadow out of the carpet! This vacuum is a godsend at such a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Liliko

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: So far. Wow! I figured it was a cheap vacuum, but it beat my expectations! I vacuumed with my dying Hoover yesterday, and filled the canister of this bissell with just my living room! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as it seems.
customer_reviews.text: The first few months was fine, it sucked everything up good. I have now had this exact vacuum for a little over a year and I'm very dissatisfied. It has lost most suction. Its so loud and it sounds like air that is supposed to be sucking stuff up is actually just escapeing somewhere. It's awkward and bulker than I expected. The hose is way to short and hardly flexible. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Miller

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is an absolute piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this vacuum for 3 months and I’m already looking for a new one! The suction stopped being great within the first week and it makes awful noises (like it’s not sealed properly). The hose clogs constantly and had to be taped because it was beginning to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Andross

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last long
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum initially started out as a 5 star product. However, within a couple months of purchasing it, the height adjuster wouldn't work. I was able to take it to a repair store and get that fixed under the warranty. Now it has started making a hissing and thrumming noise, while losing suction. I'm assuming this is a problem with the air seal around the canister. The repair store that handles warranty fixes is not close by, so continuously taking this in for repairs is not at all convenient. Considering the price of the vacuum and the reputation of Bissell, I would have expected this to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, does a good job
customer_reviews.text: After not having a working vacuum in my carpeted apartment for nearly a year, we were desperately in need of a good vacuum. It successfully made our carpet look good as new! I only had to empty the chamber once after vacuuming the entire apartment. It is easy to use and empty. The attachments are great for vacuuming the furniture. In an apartment with a cat, this product is a must! The chamber that collects dirt is very easy to empty out and put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Marina S.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Issue
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum has excellent suction no issue there. The largest problem is the wheels. Cat litter sticks to the wheels and drops off all over the room. Defeats the reason for using the vacuum in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum! I was using a smaller Bissel vacuum for pet hair and floors that doesn’t come with the extra accessories since we only have flooring and just a small living room carpet but it did not do what we needed. We have a pretty big dog and he sheds like crazy and I stumbled upon this and the reviews are great. The first time going over the carpet it picked up literally everything! The assembly was super quick and easy. I highly recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a Dyson, Hoover and now this one. For the money, you get what you pay for. It’s clunky, it doesn’t move easy, it reminds me of my moms vacuum growing up. It works, but best of luck on corners and tight spaces. There is no body movement and it’s worth it to spend more for a better clean.
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this vacuum for about a year and it's still working great. We have two dogs and two kids. We thought we had a relatively clean carpet. Boy, after using this vacuum for the first time, we were absolutely amazed and disgusted at the amount of animal and human hair this thing picked up. After a year it still picks up great, but there is a very slight odor associated with use. The canister is also a little difficult to clean on the inside. However, these are both minor issues that we can certainly deal with. Certainly a good product and a good value for the price. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Bissell Cleanview Upright Bagless Vacuum Cleaner, Orange, 1831
product_meta.description: Unlike other vacuums that require you to go over the same floor area multiple times before they vacuum up all of the debris, the Bissell Cleanview upright vacuum is engineered with one pass technology that has powerful suction plus an innovative brush design to clean on the initial pass. With a multi-cyclonic system for lasting, powerful suction plus a lightweight design that's easy to push and carry, the Bissell Cleanview is the perfect combination of form and function. Multi-level filtration with a washable filter helps reduce household dust and allergens. Plus, this easy to use vacuum is equipped with a large-capacity, bottom-empty dirt bin for quick, mess-free emptying. To clean those hard-to-reach areas, The Bissell Cleanview Includes specialized tools including a dusting brush, crevice tool, and Turbo brush tool that are perfect for cleaning furniture, stairs, upholstery, and more. (Removes most surface debris based on visual test BTP0221).
feature_bullets: One pass technology with powerful suction and innovative brush design to clean on the initial pass (removes most surface debris based on visual test BTP0221)
Powerful, multi cyclonic suction system for lasting suction that captures and keeps dirt in the bin, where it belongs
Multi-level filtration with a washable filter helps reduce household dust and allergens. Power: 8 amps
Lightweight design makes it easy to carry and push without sacrificing power. Automatic cord rewind no. Surface type: Bare floors, carpet, sealed hard floors, low pile carpet, stairs, upholstery
Extended cleaning reach with a 25 foot power cord, 6 foot hose, and 13.5 inch cleaning path; Dirt cup capacity 2 liters

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars6,870 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Vacuum base^vacuum handle^ vacuum hose^ vacuum tools
